name: Yah ' Dungeon Crawler ' Tzee
description:
Can't decide between playing an old boring game of Yahtzee or an exiting new Rogue-Like that just came out? Don't hesitate anymore and play Yah ' Dungeon Crawler ' Tzee or Y'DC'T for short. You'll be sure to have milde exitement and feel just a little bit maybe not better but at least just a little bit different than usual. 1/ Controls
  • Enter - Throw Dice / When room cleared go to next Dice / Select Combination
  • Space / X - Strike
  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Arrow keys - Character Rotation
  • Tab - Global View
2/ Credits
  • Jules PESIN - Solo Dev - @juels_ry
